Articles.Content:
Loving Kerbal - ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I hope this post works. My 1st post mentioned "will be posted after ok'd by a moderator" (or something like that) - It now seems to have disappeared into the ether ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Addendum - My 1st post is now visible although there does seem to be a problem with my screenshot. [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113652-Contract-Explore-the-mun](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113652-Contract-Explore-the-mun)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-21T17:36:22Z" title="03/21/2015 05:36  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 21, 2015</time> by Telesto**

Hi Telesto and welcome to the forums!

The first few posts have to be checked by a mod to prevent spambots and such. After three posts, I believe, you can choose an avatar and post images.

Happy landings!
Welcome aboard! Yep, it takes a bit to make sure you check out. So far, though, you seem pretty human to me!
